data.name: Orcs Must Die! Unchained - Hero Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Every rift war needs a few good heroes, and this bundle is full of them! Instantly add 13 heroes from Orcs Must Die! Unchained to your collection and start earning hero chest rewards today!

Bundle Includes:

• Zoey – The Chaotic Apprentice
• Temper – The Rage of the Forge
• Oziel – The Soul Thief
• Bionka – Queen Momma
• Ivy – Warden of the First Grove
• Smolder – The Fireborn
• Cygnus – The Master of the Order
• Hogarth – Frozen Shield of Deg Itan
• Bloodspike – The Brutal
• Dobbin – Claim Jumper
• Midnight – Twighlight’s Razor
• Stinkeye – Shaman of Oasis
• Tundra – Oathkeeper of Arctos

Note: This bundle has one flat price for all players, regardless of whether individual heroes have been unlocked previously.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
